mapper.select: select g.game_id GameId, g.common_name GameName, z.total Total from mug_game g left join (select p.game_id, count(1) total from mug_package p group by p.game_id) z on g.game_id = z.game_id order by g.filter_index

select p.package_id PackageId, p.game_id GameId, p.package_name PackageName, p.package_price PackagePrice, p.release_date ReleaseDate, p.description Description, p.remarks Remarks from mug_package p where p.game_id = #{gameId} order by p.release_date
